name: Demon Driver
summary:
Demon Driver by Tomy 
1978 Analogue Tabletop game, in which you race your car along the 'real' moving plastic track. This early electronic game features a lap counter, 4 speed settings and steering wheel. 
 
This example of the game is in Excellent, fully tested condition, Overall 9/10. Includes instructions on base, and battery cover. Outer box is rather tatty and includes just one poly inner, 6.5/10 overall.
